explanation: [0-0] The sky is azure and cloudless. On the beach, a man wearing floral shorts and a white hat stands with his back to the camera, looking at a woman in white shorts in front of him. The woman is looking down at the ground, seemingly searching for something. In the background, there are many scattered people, some walking and some resting. On the right side of the beach, some green parasols and deck chairs can be seen, probably for tourists to use. The right side of the beach is the blue sea, and the left side has some modern white buildings.

[0-4] As the camera moves to the left, you can see a black-haired woman wearing a bikini and sunglasses. One of the girls in a bikini throws the ball in her hand into the air and then gently kicks it towards the woman in white shorts in front of her. The ball hits the woman's head and bounces back, making the woman who was hit bend over and laugh, while the woman who kicked the ball looks up and laughs. The three women chat cheerfully.
